pages.text: Here you will learn to master amethyst totems and their abilities. To begin:$(li)First find a $(#b0b)Heart of the Sea$() and craft it into a $(l:amethyst_imbuement:recipes/recipes)$(#b0b)Golden Heart$()$(li)Next imbue that heart into a $(#b0b)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/crystalline_heart)Crystalline Heart$() with some soul energy, giving it the ability to look after you.

$(li)With a now-pulsing heart in hand, you can craft your $(#b0b)Totem of Amethyst$()$(li)Once crafted, apply an appropriate Augment to grant yourself powerful passive and active abilities!$(br2)$(l)Note: Totems can have one passive $(o)and$() $(l)one active augment at a time!$()
